inclusion.criterion: Meet the National Institute of Aging-Alzheimer's Association criteria for probable AD
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Twelve-item Neuropsychiatric Inventory with score 4 or greater
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Stable doses current medications, including acetylcholinesterase inhibitors if applicable, for at least 4 weeks prior to trial entry
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Reliable caregiver willing and available to assist with medication administration, outcome measures
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Use of anti-epileptic medication for any indication within previous three months
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has a history of epilepsy and is currently on valium, which may trigger seizures. He also had a recent seizure episode.
